languages.text: {n}Абеляр морщится и произносит тихо, так, чтобы услышали только вы, но не младшие офицеры:{/n} "И стоило ради этого покидать мостик? Приказ можно было отдать и оттуда..."
{n}Abelard frowns and pitches his voice low so that his words do not reach the other officers:{/n} "And it was worth leaving the bridge for this? You could have issued the order from there..."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр морщится и произносит тихо, так, чтобы услышали только вы, но не младшие офицеры:{/n} "И стоило ради этого покидать мостик? Приказ можно было отдать и оттуда..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard frowns and pitches his voice low so that his words do not reach the junior officers:{/n} "And it was worth leaving the bridge for this? You could have issued the order from there..."

{n}Abelard frowns and pitches his voice low so that his words do not reach the junior officers:{/n} "And it was worth leaving the bridge for this? You could have issued the order from there..."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德皱起眉头，压低了声音，以免他的话传到其他军官耳中。{/n}“就为了这种事情，值得您离开舰桥吗？您本可以在舰桥发布命令……“
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard frowns and pitches his voice low so that his words do not reach the other officers:{/n} "And it was worth leaving the bridge for this? You could have issued the order from there..."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德皱起眉头，压低了声音，以免他的话传到其他军官耳中。{/n}“就为了这种事情，值得您离开舰桥吗？您本可以在舰桥发布命令……“
{n}阿贝拉德皱起眉头，压低了声音，以免他的话传到下级军官耳中。{/n}“就为了这种事情，值得您离开舰桥吗？您本可以在舰桥发布命令……“

languages.text: {n}Abelard frunce el ceño y baja tanto la voz que sus palabras no alcanzan a los otros oficiales.{/n} «¿Y merecía la pena abandonar el puente para esto? Podría haber dado la orden desde allí...».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard frowns and pitches his voice low so that his words do not reach the other officers:{/n} "And it was worth leaving the bridge for this? You could have issued the order from there..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard frunce el ceño y baja tanto la voz que sus palabras no alcanzan a los otros oficiales.{/n} «¿Y merecía la pena abandonar el puente para esto? Podría haber dado la orden desde allí...».

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは顔をしかめ、他の士官に届かないように声をひそめてつぶやいた。{/n}「このためにブリッジを離れる価値があったのでしょうか？ブリッジから命令を出すこともできたでしょうに…」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard frowns and pitches his voice low so that his words do not reach the other officers:{/n} "And it was worth leaving the bridge for this? You could have issued the order from there..."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは顔をしかめ、他の士官に届かないように声をひそめてつぶやいた。{/n}「このためにブリッジを離れる価値があったのでしょうか？ブリッジから命令を出すこともできたでしょうに…」
{n}アベラルドは顔をしかめ、下士官に届かないように声をひそめてつぶやいた。{/n}「このためにブリッジを離れる価値があったのでしょうか？ブリッジから命令を出すこともできたでしょうに…」

languages.text: {n}Abelard runzelt die Stirn und senkt die Stimme, damit die anderen Offiziere seine Worte nicht hören:{/n} "Und hat es sich gelohnt, dafür die Brücke zu verlassen? Ihr hättet den Befehl auch von dort aus erteilen können ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard frowns and pitches his voice low so that his words do not reach the other officers:{/n} "And it was worth leaving the bridge for this? You could have issued the order from there..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard runzelt die Stirn und senkt die Stimme, damit die niederen Offiziere seine Worte nicht hören:{/n} "Und hat es sich gelohnt, dafür die Brücke zu verlassen? Ihr hättet den Befehl auch von dort aus erteilen können ..."

{n}Abelard runzelt die Stirn und senkt die Stimme, damit die niederen Offiziere seine Worte nicht hören:{/n} "Und hat es sich gelohnt, dafür die Brücke zu verlassen? Ihr hättet den Befehl auch von dort aus erteilen können ..."

languages.text: {n}Abélard se renfrogne et baisse d'un ton pour éviter que les autres officiers l'entendent :{/n} « Et c'est pour ça que vous avez quitté la passerelle ? Vous auriez tout aussi bien pu donner vos instructions sans faire le déplacement jusqu'ici... »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard frowns and pitches his voice low so that his words do not reach the other officers:{/n} "And it was worth leaving the bridge for this? You could have issued the order from there..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard se renfrogne et baisse d'un ton pour éviter que les autres officiers l'entendent :{/n} « Et c'est pour ça que vous avez quitté la passerelle ? Vous auriez tout aussi bien pu donner vos instructions sans faire le déplacement jusqu'ici... »

languages.text: {n}Abelard yüzünü buruşturuyor ve diğer subaylar sözlerini duyamasın diye ses perdesini alçaltıyor.{/n} "Köprüyü terk etmek buna değdi mi şimdi? Emri oradan da verebilirdiniz."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard frowns and pitches his voice low so that his words do not reach the other officers:{/n} "And it was worth leaving the bridge for this? You could have issued the order from there..."
